dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2592601R] Copyright Infringement - tagalogdvd.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2007 1:31 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2592601R] Copyright Infringement - tagalogdvd.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain) 
  
 
Dear Sir: 
 
  
 
We were unhappy to find our copyrighted materials being advertised
illegally for sale on one of your hosted sites (www.tagalogdvd.com).
Our company is the sole copyright holder for the video contents being
illegally distributed via www.tagalogdvd.com
<http://www.tagalogdvd.com/> .  As such, we request that you take
appropriate measures to comply with the Digital Millennium Act. 
 
  
 
Our decision to write to you came about after repeated attempts to
contact the owner of the website were unsuccessful.  Your cooperation in
this matter is greatly appreciated.  Please find attached a list of
infringed film title and some of the copyright certificates filed with
the U.S. Copyright Office. 
For additional information or inquiries, please call (650)952-4891 or
email to rlim@regalfilms.com 
 
  
 
Sincerely, 
 
  
 
Ric Lim 
 
Regal Capital, Inc
